TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImageList extends System.ComponentModel.Component
Public NotInheritable Class ImageList Inherits Component
public ref class ImageList sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Windows.Forms.Design.ImageListCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 提供方法來管理 物件的集合。

span.span: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常是由其他控制項，例如， ，或。 is typically used by other controls, such as the , , or . 您可以將點陣圖或圖示，將，而且能夠使用映像，因為它們需要其他控制項。You can add bitmaps or icons to the , and the other controls are able to use the images as they require. 使用控制代碼來管理映像的清單。 uses a handle to manage the list of images. 才建立某些作業，例如取得或呼叫，會在影像清單上執行。The is not created until certain operations, such as getting the or calling , are performed on the image list. 執行其他作業，例如設定或會導致重新建立。Performing other operations, such as setting the or will cause the to be recreated. 因此，您應該執行這些作業新增至映像之前。Therefore, you should perform these operations before you add images to the . 此外，您將當地語系化的表單上運作，您應該一律將加入及當表單的 [語言] 屬性設定為預設影像。In addition, when you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 變更表單的語言，然後再新增映像可能會損毀應用程式資源檔案。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the application resource files. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何選取、 移除和顯示的影像。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images. [!code-cpp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 、 和 的預設值來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values for , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |項目Item|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||在 .NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值為 。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is . 在 .NET Framework 1.1 (含) 以後版本中，預設值為 。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is .| ||預設值是具有高度和寬度 16 x 16 的物件。The default is a object with a height and width of 16 by 16.| ||預設值是 。The default value is .| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`和`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，將它與容器 (Container) 相關聯。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, associating it with a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式可讓您將與任何物件。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 透過建立關聯像這樣，您手動控制的存留期至。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果您在應用程式中使用多個元件，而且想要同時處置所有元件，這可能會很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 比方說，如果您建立的關聯、 ，和與，則呼叫容器將會強制所有這些元件以及處置。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the Container will force disposal of all of these components as well.

span.span: Gets the color depth of the image list.
The number of available colors for the image.

value.span: 在 .NET Framework 1.0 版中，預設值為 。

span.span: In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is .

value.span: 在 .NET Framework 1.1 (含) 以後版本中，預設值為 。

span.span: In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將色彩深度設定為新的值，重新建立映像清單。When you set the color depth to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因為設定屬性而導致重新建立控制代碼，應將之前設定屬性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 當的控制代碼建立之後，設定或程式碼之後設定,屬性，會導致使用的設定的影像集合要刪除的屬性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted.

exception.span: 這個色彩深度不是有效的 列舉值。

span.span: The color depth is not a valid enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會對應至 Win32 HIMAGELIST 控制代碼。This corresponds to a Win32 HIMAGELIST handle. 您需要使用它之前，不會建立控制代碼。The handle is not created until you need to use it. 取得處理常式，會使它建立。Getting the handle causes it to be created.

exception.span: 建立 的控制代碼失敗。

span.span: Creating the handle for the failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Images As ImageList.ImageCollection

span.span: Gets the for this image list.
The collection of images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未建立映像的集合，則會建立時擷取這個屬性。If the image collection has not yet been created, it is created when you retrieve this property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`和`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size ImageSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定影像清單中的影像大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.

value.span: ，定義清單中的影像高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The that defines the height and width, in pixels, of the images in the list.
The default size is 16 by 16.
The maximum size is 256 by 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性，再將影像加入至影像集合會使指定的映像大小所能調整的映像。Setting the property prior to adding images to the image collection causes the images to be resized to the image size specified. 當您將屬性設為新值，重新建立映像清單。When you set the property to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 因為設定屬性而導致重新建立控制代碼，應將之前設定屬性。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 當的控制代碼建立之後，設定或程式碼之後設定,屬性，會導致使用的設定的影像集合要刪除的屬性。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構，將影像加入至屬性，並將屬性，並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要執行此範例中，將它放在包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 此範例假設存在`FeatherTexture.bmp`和`Gone Fishing.bmp`在 c:\Windows\\。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果點陣圖不存在於您的系統，或存在於另一個位置，請據此變更的範例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ImageListStreamer ^ ImageStream { System::Windows::Forms::ImageListStreamer ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ImageListStreamer ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得與這個影像清單相關的 。

span.span: Gets the associated with this image list.

value.span: 如果影像清單是空白的，則為 ，否則會是這個 的 。

span.span: if the image list is empty; otherwise, a for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是影像清單的資料部分。The is the data portion of the image list. 您將當地語系化的表單上運作，您應該一律將加入及當表單的 [語言] 屬性設定為預設影像。When you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 變更表單的語言，然後再新增映像可能會損毀的影像資料流。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the image stream. 您可以將此控制代碼傳遞給另一個執行個體。You can pass this handle to another instance of an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RecreateHandle As EventHandler

summary.span: 當重新建立 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the is recreated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此事件以執行特殊處理時會重新建立動作，例如變更或。You can use this event to do special processing when the is recreated by actions such as changing the or . 因為設定特殊的處理可能需要或屬性設定之後屬性會導致重新建立控制代碼和捨棄的映像。Special processing may be required because setting the or the property after setting the property causes the handle to be recreated and the images to be discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ImageList1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ImageList1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#160)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color TransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定視為透明的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繪製影像時，就不會轉譯為透明的色彩。The transparent color is not rendered when the image is drawn.
